thread.title: Stronger Dollar, Higher Treasury Yields Hurt Gold

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stronger Dollar, Higher Treasury Yields Hurt Gold

organizations.name: higher treasury yields hurt gold gold

text:
Gold prices fell for the third time in the last four sessions Friday, hurt by a stronger dollar and a rise in Treasury yields.
Front-month gold for April delivery declined 0.7% to $1,336.70 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange. Prices have traded between $1,305 and $1,360 this year, moving within that range based on demand for safe-haven assets, swings in the dollar and worries about higher interest rates.
...
